#include<iostream>
    #include<cstdio>
    # include<cstring>
    using namespace std;
 
    int main()
    {
        int t;
        char text[50];
 
        scanf("%d",&t);
 
        while(t--)
            {
                scanf("%s",&text);
				int n=strlen(text);
				int a=n/2,i;
				//cout<<n<<"  "<<a-1<<"  "<<a;
				for(i=a-1;i>=0;i--)
				printf("%c",text[i]);
				for(i=n-1;i>=a;i--)
				printf("%c",text[i]);
				printf("\n");
        }
        return 0;
    }
